question.text: Which of the following properties correctly describes the plant depicted in this diagram?

options.text: It produces seeds but they are not enclosed in fruits.
It has gametophyte and sporophyte which are independent of each other.
It is a vascular cryptogam placed under class Lycopsida
It shows protonema stage in its life cycle and doesn't bear true roots

solution.text: The diagram given is of Equisetum. It is a pteridophyte which is placed under class Sphenopsida. It is a vascular cryptogam (having vascular tissue but not producing seeds). It has a haplo-diplontic life cycle in which the gameyophyte and sporophyte are independent of each other. Production of seeds without fruits is a characteristic of gymnosperms. Protonema stage and plant without true roots are seen mosses.
